description: A quick and easy cup holder mounting kit that secures most portable devices. The Cup-iT’s sturdy flex shaft and 360° rotating capability adds more versatility for easier viewing and access and a secure base. Also included is the Grip-iT Mobile Device Holder that works with almost any portable device. The kit installs in seconds into your vehicle’s existing cup holder. The Cup-iT is compatible with most standard size cup holder openings up to 3.75” in diameter. Includes a 1 year warranty.
title: Bracketron UCH-101-BL Universal Cup-iT II Mount with Grip-iT for GPS
